FuncDef: Configures an IEEE 802.3 LLC SNAP Ethernet frame OUI zero or non-zero value to be used as a service ingress QoS policy match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies to match packets with the 3-byte OUI field in the SNAP-ID set to zero.
Specifies to match packets with the 3-byte OUI field in the SNAP-ID not set to zero.
